event.name: NEW Social Impact Design Minor Information Session
event.shortDescription: Come learn about the new Social Impact Design minor!

description.html:
Engagement Lab, 160 Boylston St, 4th Floor

Do you want to learn how to apply your creative skills and passions to make the world a better place? Come learn about the new Social Impact Design minor. Social Impact Design students work collaboratively with classmates and community partners to advance social justice in a variety of issues, including gun violence prevention and climate change. Every class emphasizes real-world, experiential learning. Through hands-on projects, you will explore your creative skills and passions for social impact, collaboratively applying art, storytelling, and creative thinking to transform unjust systems.

In this info session you will learn more about the curriculum, meet faculty, explore the Engagement Lab, and ask all your questions. Lunch is provided!
